description.db:para: Persistent sca information for the b2b_sca module. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;b2b_sca.html

column.name: id
column.description: unique ID

column.name: shared_line
column.description: The shared line.

column.name: watchers
column.description: The URI list of watchers

column.name: app1_shared_entity
column.description: The entity to keep.

column.name: app1_call_state
column.description: The state of the appearance index.

column.name: app1_call_info_uri
column.description: The URI of the Call-Info header

column.name: app1_call_info_appearance_uri
column.description: The URI of the appearance in Call-Info header

column.name: app1_b2bl_key
column.description: The b2b_logic key.
